fields.description: This is the entrance to the caves. A single light stralen vallen behind you through denn eingant. Towards the north there is a large tunnel that looks almost like hell. To the west there is a crevice and to the east there is a small shaft.

items.description: A shining emerald. It looks like it's been part of a piece of jewelery
items.name: emerald

fields.savePoint: The very beginning of the adventure

fields.description: This nothing but a plain dark tunnel

items.description: An extinguished torch that somebody must have left here
items.name: torch

fields.description: You stand in front of an ancient looking door. It is locked.

items.description: A swipey thing that somebody must have lost. It is super dusty!
items.locationDescription: It is laying on the floor right in front of us
items.name: Swipey thing
